g.text: Basic debian image with development packages: gcc, gfortran, etc

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 126px; margin-left: 266px;

div.div: Dependencies needed for full simulation: Root, Geant4, Gaudi, etc.

g.text: Full simulation stack: DD4Hep detector geometry, reconstruction algorithms
